Items.Title: Application no. 20005386 HAX, an Urban Development Action Area Project, located at 419-21 East 157th Street, Council District no. 17, Borough of the Bronx.  This matter is subject to Council review and action pursuant to Article 16 of the New York General Municipal Law, at the request of the York City Department of Housing Preservation and Development and pursuant to Section 577 of the Private Housing Finance Law for a partial tax exemption.
